Project.name: PureMVC Standard and Tests for Python
Project.Description: PureMVC is a lightweight framework for creating applications based upon the classic Model-View-Controller design meta-pattern. This is the specific implementation for the Python language based on the Standard Version AS3 reference. See the Release Notes for this version for differences from the reference implementation.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Summary of Changes in 1.1 * Updated Fabfile. * Fixed FIFO bug in MacroCommand.execute() * Fixed typo in Proxy docstring Summary of Changes in 1.0 * Update in sync with release 2.0.4 of the AS3 Standard Version. * Added a fabfile to build documentation and unit tests ( http://www.nongnu.org/fab/) Summary of Changes in 0.6 * Update in sync with releases 2.0.2 and 2.0.3 of the AS3 Standard Version. Summary of Changes in 0.5 * Removed .pyc files and completed docs. Summary of Changes in 0.4 * New package structure and installer script. Summary of Changes in 0.3 * Complete rewrite with unit tests and documentation by Toby. Summary of Changes in 0.2 * Current state of port by Nathan. Features in 0.1 * Initial project structure created in repository - CLH
Project.Installation: Installing the Project Source Code From the archive * Download the latest source code archive. * Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance: c:\development\ * You will see a PureMVC_Python_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance: c:\development\PureMVC_Python_X_Y From the Repository * Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
